title: Question 26:
description: Why did I receive more or less Synths in a trade than I should have?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: With on chain prices there is always a risk of frontrunning. To protect SNX stakers from frontrunning exposure a fee reclamation mechanism was introduced. Visit Synthetix [blog](https://blog.synthetix.io/how-fee-reclamation-rebates-work/) page for a detailed explanation.
